editorialNotes.standard: Quickly sift through colourful clutter to find identical items in this clever spin on match-3 puzzling.
This twist on the iconic board game lets you build landmarks, wreck rivals’ property, and rake in profits.

editorialNotes.short: A challenging combo of word search and crosswords
editorialNotes.tagline: A combo of word search and crosswords

ios.subtitle: Dress Up Paper doll in DIY

editorialNotes.standard: Hipster Whale's Apple Design Award–winning game takes a timeless arcade formula—cross a road bustling with traffic and deadly obstacles—and transforms it into an adorable infinite runner. As you progress, you’ll unlock new characters with wildly diverse looks and effects. There’s a teeny-tiny flea, an emo goose, and even a few characters from other games—like Epoch, who sprays cars with blocky bullets. The creativity and care put into Crossy Road’s wacky world are unmistakable.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It’s hard to understate Clash of Clans’ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile–we still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught.
